name: Double Pong
description:
Controls:

Player 1 Right and left arrows to move. Arrow keys up and down to accelerate or decelerate. 

You can also play with control, the left stick moves one. With the A and B buttons you accelerate and decelerate.

Player 2 A and D keys to move. W and S keys to accelerate or decelerate. 

You can also play with control, the left stick moves one. With the A and B buttons you accelerate and decelerate.
